sentences.en: ‘Do you know where the screws are?’ ‘There are some in the garage.’
sentences.cn: “你知道螺丝钉在哪儿吗？”“车库里有一些。”

sentences.en: "I told you Preskel had no idea," remarked Kemp with some asperity.
sentences.cn: “我告诉过你普雷斯克毫不知情的，”肯普颇为不耐烦地说道。

sentences.en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentences.cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentences.en: Give me some others.
sentences.cn: 给我一些其他的吧。

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentences.cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentences.en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentences.cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

sentences.en: He travels with some politicians.
sentences.cn: 他和一些政客有来往。

sentences.en: He was carrying on about some stupid television series.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休地说着某个无聊的电视连续剧。

sentences.en: His speech gave us some enlightenment.
sentences.cn: 他的发言给我们一些启迪。

sentences.en: I’ve just made a pot of coffee. Would you like some?
sentences.cn: 我刚煮了一壶咖啡，你想喝点吗？

sentences.en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentences.cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentences.en: In some cases there is a mini-mum age limit.
sentences.cn: 有些情况下有最低年龄限制。

sentences.en: In the interview he gave some grounds for optimism.
sentences.cn: 他接受采访时阐述了持乐观态度的理由。

sentences.en: She gained some 25 pounds in weight during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 她在怀孕期间体重差不多增加了 25 磅。

sentences.en: Some battles you win, some battles you lose.
sentences.cn: 胜败乃兵家常事。

sentences.en: The commander and some of the men had been released.
sentences.cn: 指挥官和一些士兵已经获释。

sentences.en: The evaluation of conduct involves some amount of generalization.
sentences.cn: 对操行的评价会含有一些泛泛之论。

sentences.en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

sentences.en: we are going to be working together for some little time yet.
sentences.cn: 我们还要在一起工作相当长的一段时间。

sentences.en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。

sentences.en: we got our money's worth and then some.
sentences.cn: 我们的钱花得相当值。

sentences.en: we got our money's worth and then some.
sentences.cn: 我们的钱花得相当值。

sentences.en: We know some sex offenders dupe the psychologists who assess them.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有些性犯罪者会愚弄给他们做测评的心理学家。

words.tran_cn: 重要的人；值得重视的事

phrases.tran_cn: (非正 式)而且远远不止于此；而且还要多

trans.tran_cn: 一些；某个；大约；相当多的
trans.tran_en: a number of people or things, or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
a fairly large number or amount of something

trans.tran_cn: 一些，某个，部分，相当多的
一些，若干，（数量不确切时用）有些人
trans.tran_en: a number of people or things or an amount of something, when the exact number or amount is not stated
